haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Obltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Kurt Wintgens
Ltn Florian Lasch
Uffz Wolfe Beckermann

 The mission was flown from Bonneuil Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 02/07/1916 near Golancourt Sub.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc 65 was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 4.
Justin Maigron was killed in action.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 02/07/1916 near Golancourt Sub.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc 65 was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 4.
Julien Antier was made a prisoner of war.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Fokker E.III.
narrative: On patrol we set upon two Nieuports.  I bring both down with shots to the engine.  One of the Frenchmen surviives but the other is lost when he tries to land his plane.
